author: kreczko
body:
Fixing issues
 - https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSLITDPG-443
 - https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSLITDPG-444
 - https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSLITDPG-445

Reducing the memory consumption by reducing the number of bins for 2D histograms (φ vs φ and E<sub>T</sub> vs E<sub>T</sub>), e .g.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1213276/35865738-3d6790ba-0b4d-11e8-833b-dd8ba3fa9c98.png)
title: [10X][DQM][L1T] Reduce memory consumption of L1T DQM plots
